places_to_visit.name: Bogotá
places_to_visit.description: Bogotá, the capital of Colombia, is a city rich in culture and history. Key attractions include the Gold Museum, which houses an impressive collection of pre-Columbian gold artifacts, and the historic Candelaria neighborhood, known for its colonial architecture and vibrant street art.

places_to_visit.name: Monserrate
places_to_visit.description: Monserrate is a mountain that overlooks Bogotá and is accessible via a cable car or funicular. At the top, visitors can enjoy panoramic views of the city and visit the Sanctuary of Monserrate, a popular pilgrimage site.

places_to_visit.name: Medellín
places_to_visit.description: Medellín is known for its transformation into a modern, vibrant city with a rich cultural scene. Key attractions include the Plaza Botero, featuring sculptures by the famous artist Fernando Botero, and the Medellín Metrocable, offering stunning views of the city and surrounding mountains.

places_to_visit.name: Comuna 13
places_to_visit.description: Comuna 13 is a neighborhood in Medellín known for its vibrant street art and cultural transformation. It has become a popular destination for guided tours that showcase its history and artistic expressions.
